context.problem: Projects exist but their capabilities are undocumented. Hard to know what each tool can do.
context.solution: Orchestrator sends prompt to project agents. Agents generate features.md in coderef/user/. Orchestrator collects and aggregates.

for_orchestrator: Send generate-features-doc.md prompt to each project agent
Agent generates features.md in their coderef/user/ folder
Collect completed features.md from each project
Aggregate into master inventory (optional: surface in Scriptboard)
for_project_agents: Document what users CAN DO (not code structure)
Include: features, shortcuts, CLI commands, API endpoints, config options
Use action-oriented language (Run workflow, not WorkflowRunner exists)

communication_log.message: Template revised. Focus on USER-FACING docs: what users CAN DO, not code structure. Include good/bad examples.
